item.title: Last Day to Register for Order of the Engineer | Sept. 26
item.description: Date: Friday, September 26, 2025 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM - The Order of the Engineer is open to all senior and graduate engineering students. For more information on the Order see: https://order-of-the-engineer.org. The ceremony will be held October 15th at 6:00 PM. You must attend to be inducted and receive your ring. You may also have your ring sized in JEC 4049. To register:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSey-EadwWdy79LqItirOHymANzIu8tYSu8ahXu1eTuNqm7McA/viewform?usp=header

item.description: Shape the future of RPI’s campus by completing our campus-wide master planning survey. item.title: Cable Television Outage in Specific Campus Buildings
item.description: Multimedia Services would like to inform the campus about an issue affecting CATV services in several buildings: Sage, Troy, Ricketts, and 87Gym. Our service provider has identified the issue–an underground cable–and will implement repairs as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate patience as we work toward a resolution. New information will be provided as soon as it becomes available. Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: RPI Hotline
item.description: New RPI Hotline - RPI has established an anonymous reporting hotline for whistleblower or other complaints about suspected improper conduct. We have engaged Mitratech, a third-party vendor to provide an anonymous ethics and compliance hotline. https://finance.rpi.edu/compliance/rpi-hotline Reports generated by the hotline will be managed by RPI’s Compliance Officer, who may refer the matter to another office for investigation and resolution. This hotline is not to be used for emergencies…

item.title: DiPrima Lecture: Frank Sottile from Texas A&M University | Sept. 29
item.description: Date: Monday, September 29, 2025 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM - A special lecture in honor of Professor Richard C. DiPrima, professor of Mathematics and former Department Chair, will be held on September 29th, at 4:00 PM. The lecture will feature Dr. Frank Sottile from Texas A&M University, titled ‘GALOIS GROUPS IN ENUMERATIVE GEOMETRY’.

item.title: Interested in learning more about the Testing Center? | Sept. 29
item.description:
Date: Monday, September 29, 2025 (all day) - The Testing Center supports students with declared accommodations as well as student-athletes with exam scheduling conflicts. We provide a distraction-reduced environment to help ensure academic success. Visit the Provost’s Website, https://provost.rpi.edu/faculty-resources/testing-center, to learn more.
